item.title: Slides
item.description: Note The slides found at this location are meant to be used in personal reference. If you are reading these slides for the first time, or are presenting these slides we recommended using the Fullscreen option found below. Fullscreen .reveal .slides ol, .reveal .slides dl, .reveal .slides ul { display: block !important; text-align: left !important; margin: 0 !important; } .reveal .slides h1, h2 { margin-top: 0 !

item.title: Next Steps
item.description: Next Steps We mainly explored navigating the file-system from a Bash shell. You can continue building Bash shell skills by referencing the official GNU Bash Reference Manual The entire manual will take you through the entire Bash shell and how it can be used. That may be overwhelming. We recommend checking out some specific sections as a great place to continue your Bash shell learning journey: Bash Shell Pipelines: to learn how to pass the output (STDOUT) of one command to another command.
